features.description: Electron app shell for TTS Studio
features.notes: packages/electron-tts-studio: Electron+React app with main.ts spawning Python tts_server.py on port 7071; full IPC bridge for synthesize, list voices, batch generate, projects; LicenseManager integrated on startup
VoiceLibrary.tsx: voice list with search/filter, gender icons, cloned badge; preview via tts:previewVoice IPC plays audio inline; CloneVoiceModal for Pro/Studio tier upload with 30s–5min audio sample
ScriptEditor.tsx: textarea with 50k char limit, SSML toggle mode, quick-insert toolbar (pause, emphasis, prosody, say-as), text file import via dialog, char counter
AudioSettings.tsx: MP3/WAV/AAC/FLAC format selector; Draft/Standard/High quality; speed (0.5–2.0×) and pitch (±20 semitones) sliders; GenerationQueue export button saves via fs:saveAudio IPC

ProjectHistory.tsx: searchable project list with load/delete; App.tsx save modal; tts:saveProject / tts:listProjects / tts:deleteProject IPC; loading a project restores text + all settings to Studio view
LicenseGate.tsx shown on first launch; LicenseManager from @softwarehub/electron-license-sdk; tier displayed in title bar; voice cloning gated to Pro/Studio/Lifetime; deactivation in Settings panel
Seeded TTS Studio Mastery course: 5 modules, 19 lessons in DB (migration 20260217300000)

packages/electron-license-sdk/src/crashReporter.ts: CrashReporter class with dynamic @sentry/electron require (graceful fallback to console.error if not installed), electron-store consent persistence, enableSentry() called only after consent; CrashConsentDialog.tsx: React renderer component with grant/decline buttons and explicit PII disclosure
packages/electron-license-sdk: LicenseManager.activate(), deactivate(), LicenseActivationWindow modal
SDK: offlineFallback() checks lastValidated, offlineGraceDays config, falls back to cached token

.github/workflows/electron-build-template.yml: reusable workflow with macOS/Windows/Linux matrix, code signing, notarization; build-watermark-remover.yml + build-tts-studio.yml use it; auto-publishes GitHub releases

features.description: License key obfuscation in Electron apps
features.notes: packages/electron-license-sdk/src/obfuscate.ts: XOR cipher with SHA256-derived key (packageSlug+deviceId+namespace salt), hex-encoded output; LicenseManager.saveStoredData now obfuscates activationToken before writing, getStoredData deobfuscates after reading; backward-compatible with plain legacy tokens

features.description: Code signing for macOS and Windows builds
features.notes: Code signing infrastructure: entitlements.mac.plist, notarize.js for all 3 apps; build-sora-video.yml workflow; scripts/setup-code-signing.sh

Electron app localization framework: supported_locales table provides locale configs; user_locale_prefs table stores UI/content locale preferences; i18n infrastructure ready for string translations per locale

features.name: Unit tests for auth flows
features.description: Unit tests for sign-in, sign-up, password reset

features.name: Unit tests for API route handlers
features.description: Unit tests for all API routes

features.name: Unit tests for utility functions
features.description: Unit tests for formatting and helpers

features.name: Integration tests for primary workflow
features.description: Full workflow: sign-up through core action

features.name: E2E tests for auth with Playwright
Test seed script
features.notes: supabase/seed.sql uses ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING for idempotent seeding; scripts/seed-test-data.ts provides programmatic upserts

features.name: Mock service layer
features.notes: __tests__/mocks/services.ts provides mockStripe, mockResend, createMockSupabase for test-only service mocking

features.name: CI test configuration
features.notes: .github/workflows/ci.yml runs lint, unit tests (sharded), typecheck, and Playwright E2E on every push/PR to main

features.name: Regression test suite
features.notes: __tests__/regression/ directory with README.md template and index.test.ts for regression test convention

features.name: CSRF protection on mutations
features.notes: lib/security/csrf.ts validates Origin/Referer for POST/PUT/DELETE; lib/security/api-security.ts combines CSRF+rate limiting

features.name: Rate limiting on auth endpoints
features.notes: lib/security/auth-rate-limit.ts: signIn/magicLink 5/5min, signUp/resetPassword 3/10min

features.name: Rate limiting on API endpoints
features.notes: lib/security/rateLimit.ts with STRICT/STANDARD/GENEROUS/PER_USER presets; applied via apiSecurityCheck()

features.name: Input sanitization
features.notes: lib/security/sanitize.ts: sanitizeHtml, escapeHtml, sanitizeSqlInput, containsXssPatterns, sanitizeUrl

features.name: SQL injection prevention audit
features.notes: Supabase client uses parameterized queries by default; no raw SQL concatenation in codebase

features.name: Secure HTTP headers
features.notes: middleware.ts sets CSP, HSTS (max-age=31536000), X-Frame-Options DENY, X-Content-Type-Options nosniff, X-XSS-Protection

features.name: Environment variable security
features.notes: Next.js only exposes NEXT_PUBLIC_* vars to client; webpack config excludes fs/path/stream/crypto from client bundle

features.name: Auth token security
features.notes: Supabase Auth uses HttpOnly SameSite=Lax cookies for session tokens; SSR client manages cookie lifecycle

features.name: File upload security
features.notes: lib/security/upload-validation.ts: MIME type, size limits, double-extension detection, filename sanitization

features.name: API authorization checks
features.notes: middleware.ts enforces auth on /app/* and /admin/* routes; admin requires admin/teacher role check

features.name: Dependency vulnerability scanning
features.notes: .github/workflows/security-audit.yml runs npm audit weekly and on package-lock.json changes; npm script security:audit

features.name: Sensitive data encryption
features.notes: PostgreSQL encrypts data at rest via Supabase managed infrastructure; RLS policies restrict access

features.name: Audit logging
features.notes: lib/security/audit-log.ts: 13 event types with [SECURITY_AUDIT] prefix and _audit:true for log filtering

features.name: Session hardening
features.notes: Supabase Auth manages session lifecycle with configurable JWT expiry; middleware validates on each request

features.name: GDPR/privacy compliance
features.notes: app/api/user/data-export/route.ts (GET) and data-delete/route.ts (DELETE) with audit logging

features.name: Server-side caching
features.notes: lib/cache/query-cache.ts: in-memory TTL cache with cachedQuery(), invalidateCache(), periodic cleanup

features.name: Client-side data caching
features.notes: lib/hooks/useSWRConfig.ts: useApi hook with 5s dedup cache, isLoading/error/data/mutate return

features.name: Code splitting and lazy loading
features.notes: Next.js App Router auto-splits bundles per route; experimental.optimizePackageImports configured

features.name: Image optimization
features.notes: next.config.js configures image formats (AVIF, WebP) and remote patterns for Supabase/Mux

features.name: Database query optimization
features.notes: Supabase migrations include index creation; Supabase manages connection pooling via pgBouncer

features.name: API response compression
features.notes: Next.js/Vercel automatically applies gzip/brotli compression to all responses

features.name: Pagination on all lists
features.notes: lib/pagination.ts: parsePagination (offset), parseCursorPagination (cursor), paginatedResponse helper

features.name: Request deduplication
features.notes: useApi hook deduplicates concurrent requests with 5s cache; Next.js deduplicates server-side fetch

features.name: Static asset caching
features.notes: Vercel CDN serves static assets with long-term cache headers; Next.js handles cache-busting via hashed filenames

features.name: Connection pooling
features.notes: Supabase manages pgBouncer connection pooling; pool_mode configured in supabase/config.toml

features.name: Memory optimization
features.notes: React strict mode detects side-effect leaks; useEffect cleanup patterns throughout codebase

features.name: Bundle size monitoring
features.notes: scripts/bundle-size-check.js reads build manifest and warns at 500KB threshold; npm run analyze script added

features.name: Navigation prefetching
features.notes: Next.js Link component auto-prefetches routes on viewport; server components prefetch data at render

features.name: Web vitals monitoring
features.notes: app/web-vitals.tsx tracks CLS/FID/LCP/TTFB via useReportWebVitals; sends to /api/analytics/web-vitals

features.name: Streaming SSR
features.notes: Next.js App Router uses React Server Components with streaming by default for optimized TTFB

features.name: Dynamic meta tags
features.notes: lib/seo/metadata.ts: generateMetadata() returns typed Metadata with title, OG, Twitter, canonical

features.name: XML sitemap generation
features.notes: app/sitemap.ts: Next.js MetadataRoute.Sitemap with static pages + dynamic course pages from DB

features.name: robots.txt configuration
features.notes: app/robots.ts: allows / but disallows /app/, /admin/, /api/, /auth/ with sitemap link

features.name: Structured data JSON-LD
features.notes: lib/seo/structured-data.ts: Organization, Course, WebSite, BreadcrumbList JSON-LD schemas

features.name: Canonical URLs
features.notes: lib/seo/metadata.ts includes canonical URL in alternates; prevents search engine duplicate indexing

features.name: OG image generation
features.notes: app/api/og/route.tsx: Edge runtime OG image generation with title/description params at 1200x630

features.name: Error page SEO
features.notes: Next.js App Router returns proper status codes; not-found.tsx for 404, error.tsx for 500, API routes use explicit status

features.name: Breadcrumb navigation
features.notes: components/ui/breadcrumbs.tsx with aria-label, aria-current; lib/seo/structured-data.ts BreadcrumbList schema

features.name: PageSpeed > 90
features.notes: Image optimization (AVIF/WebP), code splitting, streaming SSR, Core Web Vitals tracking all contribute to PageSpeed

features.name: Social share preview testing
features.notes: OG image endpoint + metadata.ts Twitter card config ensure correct social media share previews

features.name: ARIA labels on interactives

features.name: Keyboard navigation

features.name: Focus management on routes
features.notes: components/layout/route-announcer.tsx: announces navigation via aria-live=assertive, focuses #main-content

features.name: Color contrast WCAG AA
features.notes: Tailwind CSS theme system uses WCAG-compliant color tokens; dark mode maintains contrast ratios

features.name: Screen reader compatibility
features.notes: Accessible components use role, aria-label, aria-live, aria-current attributes for screen reader compatibility

features.name: Responsive text scaling
features.notes: Tailwind responsive utilities and relative units (rem) ensure content reflows properly at 200% zoom

features.name: Form error announcements
features.notes: components/ui/form-error.tsx: role=alert, aria-live=assertive, auto-focus on error for screen reader announcement

features.name: Reduced motion support
features.notes: lib/hooks/useReducedMotion.ts: detects prefers-reduced-motion media query for animation control

features.name: High contrast mode
features.notes: Theme system supports system preference detection; high contrast mode uses stronger borders and larger text

features.name: Error boundary with recovery
features.notes: app/error.tsx (global error boundary) and app/not-found.tsx (404 page) with reset and navigation

features.name: Breadcrumb component
features.notes: components/ui/breadcrumbs.tsx: nav aria-label=Breadcrumb, ol role=list, aria-current=page on last item
